bootleg.translation[0].definitions[0].de: bootleg alcohol, software, or recordings are made and sold illegally
bootleg.translation[0].definitions[1].de: bootleg jeans, trousers etc become wider at the end of each leg
bootleg.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an illegal recording of a music performance
bootleg.translation[2].definitions[0].de: to illegally make or sell alcohol, or to illegally make or sell copies of software or recordings
bootleg.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: 900 bootleg videos of pop concerts have been seized by trading standards officers.
